mapper.select: select origin_id from teacher where origin_school_id=#{schoolId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO teacher (origin_id,name,sex,member,title,birthdate,origin_school_id,origin_campus_id) VALUES
(#{item.originId},#{item.name},#{item.sex},#{item.member},#{item.title},#{item.birthdate},#{item.originSchoolId}, #{item.originCampusId})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name=VALUES(name), sex=VALUES(sex), member=VALUES(member), birthdate=VALUES(birthdate), title=VALUES(title)
